actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: To provide for the acquisition and publication of data about crimes that manifest prejudice based on race, religion, homosexuality or heterosexuality, or ethnicity.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Hate Crime Statistics Act - Directs the Attorney General to include within the Uniform Crime Reports for calendar years 1989 through 1993 the incidence of criminal acts that manifest prejudice based on race, religion, homosexuality or heterosexuality, or ethnicity. States that nothing in this Act creates a right for an individual to bring an action complaining of discrimination based on homosexuality. Requires the Attorney General to publish an annual summary of the data acquired under this Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for the acquisition and publication of data about crimes that manifest prejudice based on race, religion, homosexuality or heterosexuality, or ethnicity.
